org.accada.epcis.repository
Class QueryInitHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.axis.handlers.BasicHandler
      org.accada.epcis.repository.QueryInitHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.axis.Handler
public class QueryInitHandler
extends org.apache.axis.handlers.BasicHandler

This is an Axis message chain handler which handles incoming SOAP messages before they reach the EPCIS query service (QueryOperationsModule). This handler performs the initialization for the query service, such as reading configuration properties, setting up the database, and loading the subscriptions from the servlet context. On fault in the query service, this handler also performs the cleanup such as closing the database connection and storing the subscriptions back to the servlet context.

Author:
Marco Steybe
See Also:
